definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
rock painting/picture or writing carved on rocks
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
Huangyan district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang

sentences.english: However, Rock Financial Showplace might also prove to be too small for the international show.
sentences.chinese: 然而，岩财务展示也可能被证明是太小，国际查看。

sentences.english: There are evaporite beds or evaporite minerals.
sentences.chinese: 矿床的含矿岩系大多含有蒸发岩。

sentences.english: The formation of scheelite deposit has an intimate relationship with amphibole-schist.
sentences.chinese: 白钨矿矿床的形成与角闪片岩关系密切。

sentences.english: The greenschists originated from a series of volcanic - sedimentary formations with intercalated intracontinental tholeiites.
sentences.chinese: 绿片岩原岩是一套含板内拉斑玄武岩的火山沉积建造。

sentences.english: The quartz sandstone appears in the upper member of Yangzhuang Formation as thin-bedded strata with double peaks of grain size distribution.
sentences.chinese: 石英砂岩呈薄层出现在杨庄组上部，具双众数结构。

sentences.english: Hydrothermal sedimentary silicalite studies are important for ore deposits.
sentences.chinese: 热水沉积硅质岩对于矿床研究具有重要意义。

sentences.english: The small ocean basin is formed and the ophiolite appear when back arc basin expands.
sentences.chinese: 弧后盆地扩张到达小洋盆，出现蛇绿混杂岩。

sentences.english: Old pitons should not be reused once they fall out.
sentences.chinese: 老旧的岩钉一旦脱出之后，就不得重新加以使用。

sentences.english: The deposits are grouped close to the present-day erosional edge of Kombolgie Formation rocks.
sentences.chinese: 矿床集中于靠近科姆波尔吉地层岩的现代侵蚀前沿。

sentences.english: I am an expert at ice climbing.
The Qiancengyan waterfall is very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 那里的千层岩瀑布很漂亮。

sentences.english: Nephrite deposits in Qinghai Province have occurred in contact belt between intermediate-acidic intrusive rocks and dolomite-marble.
sentences.chinese: 青海软玉矿床产于中酸性侵入岩与大理岩接触带中。

sentences.english: This is Jiangjun Cliff. On the right, it is Yuanyang waterfall.
sentences.chinese: 这是将军岩，在右边是鸳鸯瀑布。

sentences.english: Two mica schists are considered to be the source bed and host rock of gold.
sentences.chinese: 二云母片岩不仅是矿源层，而且还是赋矿围岩。

sentences.english: With more than 600 islands and coral cays, the reef covers more than 300, 000 sq.
sentences.chinese: 大堡礁有超过600个岛屿与珊瑚礁岩。

definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
